name: Enhanced Business Intelligence AI Agent v3.0 (Optimized)

parameters.query:
SELECT 
  m.content, 
  m.memberId as user_id, 
  m.createdAt as timestamp,
  m.role,
  m.fileUrl,
  COALESCE(mem.name, m.memberId) as user_name,
  COUNT(*) OVER() as total_messages
FROM message m
LEFT JOIN member mem ON m.memberId = mem.id
WHERE m.channelId = '{{ $json.channelId }}' 
  AND m.deleted = false
  AND m.content IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY m.createdAt DESC 
LIMIT 20

Be helpful and don't be afraid to show your wit!

parameters.name: smart_calendar_manager
parameters.description: Intelligent calendar management hub for all calendar operations including viewing, creating, updating, deleting, and searching events. Automatically determines the best operation based on user intent.

timeframe.description: Time period for viewing/searching (e.g., 'today', 'this week', 'next month')

search_criteria.description: Search terms for finding specific events

additionalFields.query:
-- Intelligent Search Hub - Dynamic Query Builder
SELECT 
  m.id,
  m.content,
  m.fileUrl,
  m.createdAt,
  m.channelId,
  m.memberId,
  m.role,
  COALESCE(mem.name, m.memberId) as user_name,
  CASE 
    WHEN m.fileUrl IS NOT NULL THEN 'file_message'
    WHEN LENGTH(m.content) > 200 THEN 'long_message'
    ELSE 'text_message'
  END as message_type
FROM message m
LEFT JOIN member mem ON m.memberId = mem.id
WHERE m.channelId = '{{ $fromAI('Channel_ID', 'Channel ID to search within', 'string') }}'
  AND m.deleted = false
  AND (
    -- Dynamic search conditions based on search type
    ('{{ $fromAI('Search_Type', 'Type of search: text, images, files, or all', 'string') || 'all' }}' = 'text' AND m.content LIKE '%{{ $fromAI('Search_Term', 'Text to search for', 'string') || '' }}%')
    OR
    ('{{ $fromAI('Search_Type', 'Type of search: text, images, files, or all', 'string') || 'all' }}' = 'images' AND m.fileUrl IS NOT NULL AND (
      m.fileUrl LIKE '%.jpg%' OR m.fileUrl LIKE '%.png%' OR 
      m.fileUrl LIKE '%.gif%' OR m.fileUrl LIKE '%.jpeg%' OR 
      m.fileUrl LIKE '%.webp%'
    ))
    OR
    ('{{ $fromAI('Search_Type', 'Type of search: text, images, files, or all', 'string') || 'all' }}' = 'files' AND m.fileUrl IS NOT NULL)
    OR
    ('{{ $fromAI('Search_Type', 'Type of search: text, images, files, or all', 'string') || 'all' }}' = 'all')
  )
  -- Optional date filter
  {{ $fromAI('Days_Back', 'Number of days to search back (optional)', 'number') ? 'AND m.createdAt >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL ' + $fromAI('Days_Back', 'Number of days to search back', 'number') + ' DAY)' : '' }}
ORDER BY m.createdAt DESC
LIMIT {{ $fromAI('Result_Limit', 'Maximum results to return', 'number') || 20 }}

options.days: ={{ $fromAI('Time_Range_Days', 'Number of days to search back (for news/recent info)', 'number') || 30 }}

parameters.name: gsa_research_suite
parameters.description: Comprehensive GSA Schedule qualification and value proposition development. Analyzes industry fit, identifies decision makers, and creates targeted value propositions for federal contracting opportunities.

company.description: Company name or website URL to research for GSA qualification

parameters.description: Extract and analyze transcripts from YouTube videos. Provide YouTube URL to get full transcript with timestamps and analysis capabilities.

values.value: ={{ JSON.stringify({ timestamp: new Date().toISOString(), user_message: $('Unified Input & Context Processor').first().json.input, session_id: $('Unified Input & Context Processor').first().json.sessionId, platform: $('Unified Input & Context Processor').first().json.platform, channel_id: $('Unified Input & Context Processor').first().json.channelId, message_count: $('Context Formatter').first().json.messageCount }) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({ ai_output: $('Enhanced AI Agent v3.0').first().json.output, tools_used: $('Enhanced AI Agent v3.0').first().json.toolCalls ? Object.keys($('Enhanced AI Agent v3.0').first().json.toolCalls) : [], processing_time: $('Enhanced AI Agent v3.0').first().json.processingTime, response_length: ($('Enhanced AI Agent v3.0').first().json.output || '').length }) }}

={{ JSON.stringify({ total_processing_time: Date.now() - $('Unified Input & Context Processor').first().json.processingStartTime, database_query_time: $('Enhanced Channel History Query').first()?.executionTime || 0, workflow_version: '3.0', optimization_status: 'active' }) }}

parameters.query: INSERT INTO message (content, channelId, memberId, createdAt) VALUES ('{{ $('Enhanced AI Agent v3.0').first().json.output || $('Enhanced AI Agent v3.0').first().json.text }}', '{{ $('Unified Input & Context Processor').first().json.channelId }}', 'ai-assistant-bot', NOW())
